title: Punjab Leisure Tour 4
overview: Explore the beautiful leisure attractions of Punjab. This tour is designed to give you an immersive experience of Leisure Spot 4.

itinerary.title: Arrival
itinerary.desc: Arrive in Punjab and transfer to your hotel.

itinerary.title: Sightseeing
itinerary.desc: Full day exploring Leisure Spot 4 and nearby areas.

itinerary.title: Departure
